hero.mainMessage: I am a creative web developer comitted to bringing your ideas to life through code.
hero.subMessage: I focus on developing interactive and user-friendly websites, as well as improving my skills in backend development. Explore my work and get in touch !

about.title: About me
about.aboutMe: I am Jean-Baptiste Paris, a web developer at ACCK. I will soon graduate with an associate degree in web development from OpenClassrooms and am passionate about front-end and back-end development as well as UI design. This portfolio showcases my past projects and technical skills to demonstrate my expertise.
